extendedInfo.description: Connect to the Arlington Heights Memorial Library on your mobile device!Search the catalog, place holds, renew items, check out eBooks, register for upcoming events, get hours and directions, ask a librarian for assistance, connect with us online, and more.We hope you enjoy it as much as we do!

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This App is just what the Library needs.   The best part is being able to check items out through the app. It takes anther card out of my wallet and makes checking out a breeze. Just sign in, scan and go.   I also like that you can look for E-books to borrow. I have a feeling I will be taking major advantage of that feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: working great
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait until more e books are available!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: First to install.
reviews.comment: So far working well. Self checkout crashed first time clicked but worked second time. Samsung epic
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not Ready for Prime Time just yet
reviews.comment: Sine in function not synching  real time, causes authentication errors.  AHML is really fantastic w/customer service ... Imagine it\'ll be great once they get the vendor to tweak their DBs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sign in needs work
reviews.comment: Samsung galaxy S 3  Was working fine until I accessed the e-book section.  Now every time I try to log onto the App it preload s the e-book login vice the normal login for the App. Takes another min for me to remember my login.
reviews.author: John Ourednik

reviews.title: Almost Ready For Checkout
reviews.comment: Great app, needs a few fixes.  My Account does not work, search needs work.  \'X-Men\' or \'X men\' searches don\'t find movie \'First Class\' for example.
reviews.author: A Google User
